person.name: Ulisses Soares
person.description: Elder Ulisses Soares is currently serving as a member of the Presidency of the Seventy. He was called to serve as a member of the First Quorum of the Seventy of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints on April 2, 2005, at age 46. He has served as a counselor and President of the Brazil South Area and as a counselor in the Africa Southeast Area.
